messages.message:
<!channel> Hi all, this proposal to remove the Bazel build system is accepted.  (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KQ4PPe2P8iiPO5s5s-TO6vy1FVf3D5IeFeuexNRV2Ec/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.b1lxop1psw7b)We will start preliminary work on this immediately (as time permits). In Q3 we'll allocate additional dedicated resources for this project.

Let me know if you have questions or concerns!
